protocol.name: P-CAGE-25569
protocol.text: Plants were grown in 12 hour days, 90-160 uE and ~24C until 4 weeks old in soil. Plants were watered every 2-3 days and fertilized with 0.5X Hoaglands every fortnight.

protocol.name: P-CAGE-25572
protocol.text: Preparation of labelled cRNA from 1-5 ug of total RNA was carried out exactly as described in the Affymetrix GeneChip Expression Analysis Technical Manual, using the Affymetrix One-Cycle Target Labeling and Control Reagents.

protocol.name: P-CAGE-25574
protocol.text: Total RNA was isolated using the RNeasy Plant Mini Protocol (QIAGEN) including an on-column DNase treatment using the RNase-free DNase set (QIAGEN) according to the manufacturerâ€™s instructions. The quality of the RNA was verified using an Agilent Bioanalyzer and spectrophotometric analysis to determine concentration and the A260 to A280 and A260 to A230 ratios.

protocol.name: P-CAGE-25628
protocol.text: The 35S:ZAT10 construct was made by cloning the PCR amplified ZAT10 (At1g27730) coding sequence from Col-0 into HindIII digested and blunt-ended binary vector containing the double CaMV 35S promoter. The resulting binary vector was transformed into Agrobacterium tumefaciens which was used for floral dip transformation of wild type (Col-0). Kanamycin resistant transformants were selected on MS medium and transferred to soil for further characterization.
